short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize the Claude chat interface by adjusting padding and other features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize the look and feel of Anthropic's Claude chat. Primarily used to expand the text area, but can also be used to change the message fonts and background colors.
